short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly switch services & regions in the AWS console using your keyboard.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AWS Quick Search is a simple, light, (unofficial) extension which enhances the AWS console's navigation bar.

Use shortcuts to toggle the services and regions menu, and search through available regions with your keyboard.

NOTE: AWS China and AWS US Gov are NOT yet supported.

Alt + S: Toggle service menu.
Alt + A: Toggle account menu.
Alt + R: Toggle region menu.
Alt + P: Toggle support menu.

Both classic and new AWS console themes are supported.

Changes in 1.2.5

### Fixed

- Allow shortcuts to be triggered from inside dynamically created frames.

See the releases page for more information on all changes:
https://github.com/Nessworthy/chrome-extension-aws-quicksearch/releases/
